summary: Two playable races with Khajiit tails and extra racial powers.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=7][color=#0198E1]Genom[/color][/size]

Introducing two new playable races inspired by the protagonist of Final Fantasy IX.[/center]


The Genom is a crossbreed of wood elves with Khajiit. Genoms are natural scouts and thieves, they have
natural poison and disease resistances and they have two racial powers. (Command Animal and Voice of Calm)

The EidoGenom is a crossbreed of Bretons with Khajiit. EidoGenoms are natural mages, they have natural
magic resistance and they have two racial powers. (Voice of Calm and MageSkin)

This mod includes four variations on the tail and is compatible with most body, hair and eye mods.
Manual installation is recommended. Please consult the readme before installing.


If you like it, please endorse.



Please check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=19752]UDO[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17666]Follower and NPC Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18032]Hadrian\'s Lair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18219]Samurai Light Armors[/url]
author: EnigManic
